# firstLineRect

**Instance Property**

The bounding rectangle of the first line of text in the drag preview.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var firstLineRect: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The first line rectangle contains the first line of text in the drag preview that may be a partial line. This property can be a zero rectangle. The initial value is also not calculated until the first time it’s used.

## Getting and setting bounding rectangles

- **bodyRect**: The bounding rectangle of the text in the middle of the drag preview.
- **lastLineRect**: The bounding rectangle of the last line of text in the drag preview.
- **adjust(firstLineRect:bodyRect:lastLineRect:textOrigin:)**: Adjusts the size and origin of the bounding rectangles during a text drag operation.
